mapper.select: SELECT LOWER(ct.alpha_two_code) AS "alphaTwoCode", ct.country_name AS "countryName", lt.landmark AS "landmark", lt.latitude AS "latitude", lt.longitude AS "longitude", lt.img_url AS "imgUrl" FROM country_code_tb ct, landmark_tb lt WHERE ct.alpha_two_code = lt.alpha_two_code ORDER BY ct.country_name ASC
